languages.text: Ксеносов друкари в нескольких невероятно редких случаях уже уличали в похищении светил Простора Коронус. Подобные грабительские налеты несут погибель целым звездным системам, однако частота, с которой они совершают кражи драгоценных звезд Человечества, вызывает подозрения. Что вызвало это учащение хищнических свершений?

On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?
languages.original_text: Ксеносов друкари в нескольких невероятно редких случаях уже уличали в похищении светил Простора Коронус. Подобные грабительские налеты несут погибель целым звездным системам, однако частота, с которой они совершают кражи драгоценных звезд Человечества, вызывает подозрения. Что вызвало это учащение хищнических свершений?

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari, on multiple occasions, have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such disastrous raids are not unheard of, but it is the frequency with which the ungodly xenos are robbing Humanity of its precious stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their despoiling activities?

The Drukhari, on multiple occasions, have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such disastrous raids are not unheard of, but it is the frequency with which the ungodly xenos are robbing Humanity of its precious stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their despoiling activities?

The Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse on multiple occasions. Such disastrous raids are not unheard of, but it is the frequency with which the ungodly xenos are robbing Humanity of its precious stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

The Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse on multiple occasions. Such disastrous raids are not unheard of, but it is the frequency with which the ungodly xenos are robbing Humanity of its precious stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

languages.text: 何とも珍しいことに、デュカーリがコロヌス・エクスパンスで太陽を盗む姿が目撃されている。このような悪行は太陽系を丸ごと破壊するのだが、腹黒い異種族が人類の貴重な星を奪う事件が度々起こり、何かがおかしいと感じ始めている。何がきっかけで、奴らの泥棒行為が増えているのだろうか？
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: デュカーリは、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいて何度も太陽を盗んでいるのが目撃されている。このような破滅的な襲撃はこれまでになかったことではないが、神なき異種族が、人類から貴重な星々をあまりにも頻繁に奪っていることに疑惑の目が向けられた。彼らの強奪行為の増加には、どんな背景があるのだろうか？

languages.text: 尽管科罗努斯扩区也曾发生过黑暗灵族窃取恒星的事故，但这样的情况极其罕见。这样的可怕袭击会造成灾难性的后果，然而，这样的劫掠绝对不会如此频繁。究竟发生了什么事情，才让那些邪恶的黑暗灵族变得如此贪婪，三番五次地掠夺人类珍贵的恒星？
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区中发生了许多次黑暗灵族窃取恒星的事故。尽管这种可怕的袭击也曾发生过，但绝对不会如此频繁。究竟发生了什么事情，才让那些邪恶的黑暗灵族变得如此贪婪，三番五次地掠夺人类珍贵的恒星？

languages.text: En de très rares occasions, les Drukharis ont été aperçus en train de voler des soleils dans les Étendues de Koronus. Si de tels raids sèment la désolation à travers des systèmes stellaires entiers, le plus inquiétant, c'est la fréquence croissante à laquelle ces infâmes xénos privent l'humanité de précieux territoires. Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu conduire à une telle hausse de leurs activités frauduleuses ?
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: Les Drukharis ont été aperçus en train de voler des soleils dans les Étendues de Koronus à plusieurs reprises. De tels raids ne sont pas rares, mais la fréquence à laquelle les xénos dépouillent l'humanité de ses précieuses étoiles soulève des soupçons. Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu conduire à une telle hausse de leurs activités frauduleuses ?

languages.text: En ocasiones muy escasas, los Drukhari han sido avistados robando soles por la Extensión de Koronus. Estas notables incursiones siembran la devastación en sistemas enteros, pero la frecuencia con la que los malvados xenos arrebatan los preciados astros a la Humanidad levanta sospechas. ¿Qué podría motivar este aumento de la rapiña?
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: Se ha avistado a los Drukhari robando soles por la Extensión de Koronus en varias ocasiones. Se sabe que los impíos xenos han hecho esto antes, pero la frecuencia del robo de los preciados astros de la Humanidad levanta sospechas. ¿Qué podría motivar este aumento de la rapiña?

languages.text: Extrem selten zwar, aber es wurde schon beobachtet, wie Drukhari in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Sonnen gestohlen haben. Ganze Sonnensysteme wurden durch solch schreckliche Raubzüge vernichtet, doch was vor allem Sorge macht, ist die Häufigkeit, mit der diese bösartigen Xenos der Menschheit nun wertvolle Sterne rauben. Was könnte der Auslöser für die Zunahme ihrer räuberischen Aktivitäten sein?
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari wurden in einigen extrem seltenen Fällen beim Diebstahl von Sonnen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung beobachtet. Derartige Angriffe verwüsten ganze Sonnensysteme, aber es ist die Häufigkeit, mit der diese bösartigen Xenos der Menschheit wertvolle Systeme entreißen, die verdächtig ist. Was könnte der Auslöser für die Zunahme ihrer räuberischen Aktivitäten sein?

languages.text: Son derece nadir olsa da Drukharilerin Koronus Enginliği'ndeki güneşleri çalmışlığı vardır. Bu dehşet verici akınlar, yıldız sistemleri için felaket anlamına gelir. Aşağılık zenoların sıklıkla İnsanlığı değerli yıldızlarından mahrum bırakması şüphe uyandırıcı. Bu açgözlü faaliyetlerindeki artışa ne neden olmuş olabilir?
languages.original_text: On extremely rare occasions, the Drukhari have been observed stealing suns in the Koronus Expanse. Such notorious raids wreak devastation across entire solar systems, but it is the frequency with which these malicious xenos are depriving Humanity of valuable stars that raises suspicion. What could have prompted this increase in their rapacious activities?

traits.locale_text: Son derece nadir yaşansa da, Drukhari'nin Koronus Enginliği'ndeki güneşleri çalmışlığı vardır. Bu dehşet verici akınlar, komple yıldız sistemleri için felaket anlamına gelir ancak bu aşağılık zenoların İnsanlığı değerli yıldızlarından etmesi olayının bu sıklıkta yaşanması şüphe uyandırıcı. Bu açgözlü faaliyetlerindeki artışa ne neden olmuş olabilir?
